48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Bakr narrated:That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: “He who seeks forgiveness has not been persistent in sin, even if he does it seventy times in a day.”

chapter.eng-name: “He Who Seeks Forgiveness Has Not Been Persistent In Sin…”
